TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataServiceCollection`1<T> extends System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection`1<!T>
Public Class DataServiceCollection(Of T) Inherits ObservableCollection(Of T)
generic <typename T> public ref class DataServiceCollection : System::Collections::ObjectModel::ObservableCollection<T>

span.span: An entity type.

summary.span: 表示在加入、移除項目或重新整理清單時提供通知的動態實體集合。

span.span: Represents a dynamic entity collection that provides notifications when items get added, removed, or when the list is refreshed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] 提供類別，以在用戶端應用程式支援資料繫結至控制項。 provides the class to support binding data to controls in client applications. 此類別繼承自類別，它會實作介面，並且是 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 和 Silverlight 為基礎的應用程式的主要資料繫結機制。This class inherits from the class, which implements the interface and is the primary data binding mechanism for Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) and Silverlight-based applications. 您可以透過使用實作 介面的任何集合來載入 繫結集合。You can load an binding collection by using any collection that implements the interface. 載入到繫結集合的項目必須實作 介面。Items loaded into the binding collection must implement the interface. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[資料繫結至控制項](~/docs/framework/data/wcf/binding-data-to-controls-wcf-data-services.md)。For more information, see [Binding Data to Controls](~/docs/framework/data/wcf/binding-data-to-controls-wcf-data-services.md). ## Examples 下列範例取自用於定義 WPF 中 `SalesOrders` 視窗之可延伸應用程式標記語言 (XAML) 頁面的程式碼後置頁面。The following example is from the code-behind page for an Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) page that defines the `SalesOrders` window in WPF. 載入視窗時，將會根據傳回客戶及相關物件 (依國家 (地區) 篩選) 的查詢結果建立 。When the window is loaded, an is created based on the result of a query that returns customers with related objects, filtered by country. 此結果繫結至 (WPF 視窗的根配置控制項) 的 屬性。This result is bound to the property of the that is the root layout control for the WPF window. [!code-csharp[Astoria Northwind Client#WpfDataBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/astoria northwind client/cs/customerorderswpf.xaml.cs#wpfdatabinding)] [!code-vb[Astoria Northwind Client#WpfDataBinding](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/astoria northwind client/vb/customerorderswpf.xaml.vb#wpfdatabinding)] 以下是上一個範例中用於定義 WPF 中 `SalesOrders` 視窗的 XAML。The following is the XAML that defines the `SalesOrders` window in WPF for the previous example. [!code-xaml[Astoria Northwind Client#WpfDataBindingXaml](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/astoria northwind client/vb/customerorderswpf.xaml#wpfdatabindingxaml)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設， 已啟用自動變更追蹤。By default, automatic change tracking is enabled for a . 當您使用建構函式提供 值給 來建立執行個體時，您可以建立使用手動變更追蹤的 執行個體。You can create an instance of that uses manual change tracking when you create an instance using a constructor that enables you to supply a value of for . 當您使用手動追蹤時，您必須實作 和 並處理引發事件，向 手動回報變更。When you use manual tracking, you must implement and and handle the raise events to manually report changes to the . 項目載入到集合之後，就會開始自動變更追蹤。Automatic change tracking begins after items are loaded into the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供給 的物件 `items` 集合通常是傳回集合中之項目的查詢。The collection of objects supplied for `items` is usually a query that returns the items in the collection. 但是，也可以提供正確型別的任何 集合。However, any collection of the correct type can be supplied. 根據預設， 已啟用自動變更追蹤。By default, automatic change tracking is enabled for a . 當您使用建構函式提供 值給 來建立執行個體時，您可以建立使用手動變更追蹤的 執行個體。You can create an instance of that uses manual change tracking when you create an instance using a constructor that enables you to supply a value of for . 當您使用手動追蹤時，您必須實作 和 並處理引發事件，向 手動回報變更。When you use manual tracking, you must implement and and handle the raise events to manually report changes to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設， 已啟用自動變更追蹤。By default, automatic change tracking is enabled for a . 使用此類別建構函式並提供 值給 `trackingMode`，以建立使用手動變更追蹤的 執行個體。Use this class constructor and supply a value of for `trackingMode` to create an instance of that uses manual change tracking. 當您使用手動追蹤時，您必須實作 和 並處理引發事件，向 手動回報變更。When you use manual tracking, you must implement and and handle the raise events to manually report changes to the . 提供給 的物件 `items` 集合通常是傳回集合中之項目的查詢。The collection of objects supplied for `items` is usually a query that returns the items in the collection. 但是，也可以提供正確型別的任何 集合。However, any collection of the correct type can be supplied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `entityChanged` 和 `collectionChanged` 函數分別是由 和 事件叫用。The `entityChanged` and `collectionChanged` functions are invoked by the and events, respectively. `entityChanged` 方法接受 值，而 `collectionChanged` 方法則接受 值。The `entityChanged` method takes an value and the `collectionChanged` method takes a value. 這兩種方法都必須傳回布林值，指出函數是否已處理事件。Both methods must return a Boolean value that indicates whether the event was handled by the function. 此方法傳回時`true`，仍會發生預設行為。When the method returns `true`, the default behavior still occurs. 根據預設， 已啟用自動變更追蹤。By default, automatic change tracking is enabled for a . 當您使用建構函式提供 值給 來建立執行個體時，您可以建立使用手動變更追蹤的 執行個體。You can create an instance of that uses manual change tracking when you create an instance using a constructor that enables you to supply a value of for . 當您使用手動追蹤時，您必須實作 和 並處理引發事件，向 手動回報變更。When you use manual tracking, you must implement and and handle the raise events to manually report changes to the .

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class a based on query execution, with the supplied change method delegates, and that uses the supplied .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設， 已啟用自動變更追蹤。By default, automatic change tracking is enabled for a . 使用此類別建構函式提供 值給 `trackingMode`，以建立使用手動變更追蹤的 執行個體。Use this class constructor to supply a value of for `trackingMode` to create an instance of that uses manual change tracking. 當您使用手動追蹤時，您必須實作 和 並處理引發事件，向 手動回報變更。When you use manual tracking, you must implement and and handle the raise events to manually report changes to the . 當 不是具有 `items` 執行個體參考的 或 時，必須提供 。The must be supplied when `items` is not a or that has a reference to a instance. `entityChanged` 和 `collectionChanged` 函數分別是由 和 事件叫用。The `entityChanged` and `collectionChanged` functions are invoked by the and events, respectively. `entityChanged` 方法接受 值，而 `collectionChanged` 方法則接受 值。The `entityChanged` method takes an value and the `collectionChanged` method takes a value. 這兩種方法都必須傳回布林值，指出函數是否已處理事件。Both methods must return a Boolean value that indicates whether the event was handled by the function. 此方法傳回時`true`，還是會發生預設行為。When the method returns `true`, the default behavior will still occur.

span.span: When , detaches all items from the .

summary.span: 從集合中移除所有項目，並選擇性地從 卸離所有項目。

span.span: Removes all items from the collection, and optionally detaches all the items from the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當項目卸離時，資料圖形中的所有相關物件也會從 卸離。When an item is detached, all related objects in the data graph are also detached from the .

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceQueryContinuation<T> Continuation { get; set; }
.property instance class System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceQueryContinuation`1<!T> Continuation
Public Property Continuation As DataServiceQueryContinuation(Of T)

public: property System::Data::Services::Client::DataServiceQueryContinuation<T> ^ Continuation { System::Data::Services::Client::DataServiceQueryContinuation<T> ^ get(); void set(System::Data::Services::Client::DataServiceQueryContinuation<T> ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得用於傳回下一組分頁式結果的接續物件。

span.span: Gets a continuation object that is used to return the next set of paged results.

value.span: 物件，其中包含用於傳回下一組分頁式結果的 URI。

span.span: A object that contains the URI to return the next set of paged results.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當資料服務中啟用分頁時， 屬性會傳回用於存取下一組分頁式結果的連結。The property returns a link that is used to access the next set of paged results when paging is enabled in the data service. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[設定資料服務](~/docs/framework/data/wcf/configuring-the-data-service-wcf-data-services.md)。For more information, see [Configuring the Data Service](~/docs/framework/data/wcf/configuring-the-data-service-wcf-data-services.md). 將分頁式結果載入到 時，您必須透過呼叫 上的 方法，傳遞從 屬性取得的 URI 執行結果，明確載入頁面。When loading a paged result into a , you must explicitly load pages by calling the method on the by passing the result of the execution of the URI that was obtained from the property. ## Examples 下列範例取自用於定義 WPF 中 `SalesOrders` 視窗之可延伸應用程式標記語言 (XAML) 頁面的程式碼後置頁面。The following example is from the code-behind page for an Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) page that defines the `SalesOrders` window in WPF. 載入視窗時，會根據傳回客戶 (按國家 (地區) 排序) 查詢的結果建立 。When the window is loaded, a is created based on the result of a query that returns customers, filtered by country. 此分頁結果的所有頁面都會載入 (包含相關的訂單)，並且會繫結至 (WPF 視窗的根配置控制項) 的 屬性。All of the pages of this paged result are loaded, along with the related orders, and are bound to the property of the that is the root layout control for the WPF window. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 將資料繫結至 Windows Presentation Foundation 項目](~/docs/framework/data/wcf/bind-data-to-wpf-elements-wcf-data-services.md)。For more information, see [How to: Bind Data to Windows Presentation Foundation Elements](~/docs/framework/data/wcf/bind-data-to-wpf-elements-wcf-data-services.md). [!code-csharp[Astoria Northwind Client#BindPagedData](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/astoria northwind client/cs/customerorderswpf3.xaml.cs#bindpageddata)] [!code-vb[Astoria Northwind Client#BindPagedData](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/astoria northwind client/vb/customerorderswpf3.xaml.vb#bindpageddata)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void Detach ();
.method public hidebysig instance void Detach() cil managed
Public Sub Detach ()
public: void Detach();

summary.span: 停用 對集合中之所有項目的追蹤。

span.span: Disables tracking of all items in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有在 是根集合時才能呼叫 方法。The method can only be called when is the root collection. 在根集合上呼叫 方法時，也會停止追蹤資料圖形中的所有相關物件。When the method is called on a collection that is a root collection, tracking is also stopped for all related objects in the data graph.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您手動追蹤集合變更時，您必須覆寫 方法以防止項目自動加入到集合。When you are manually tracking changes to the collection, you must override the method to prevent items from being automatically added to the collection.

span.span: Loads entities into the collection.

summary.span: 將實體物件集合載入到集合中。

span.span: Loads a collection of entity objects into the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫 方法會附加集合中的所有物件 (如果這些物件還沒有附加到與 相關聯的 )。Calling the method attaches all objects in the collection, if they are not already attached to the that is associated with the . 透過使用 方法附加物件時，也會附加所有相關物件。When an object is attached by using the method, all related objects are also attached.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Load (T item);
.method public hidebysig instance void Load(!T item) cil managed
Public Sub Load (item As T)
public: void Load(T item);

param.name: item
param.span: 要加入的實體物件。

span.span: Entity object to be added.

summary.span: 將單一實體物件載入到集合中。

span.span: Loads a single entity object into the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫 方法會附加此物件 (如果此物件還沒有附加到與 相關聯的 )。Calling the method attaches the object, if it is not already attached to the that is associated with the . 透過使用 方法附加物件時，也會附加所有相關物件。When an object is attached by using the method, all related objects are also attached.
